candidates.why: Exact oracle command doc for the requested behavior, headings, artifacts, and agent invocation flow.
Closest orchestrator pattern (detection-first + Task subagent + standardized package write under .workflow/active/{session}/.process).
Coverage-oriented analysis patterns and validation steps that align with 'coverage-first' philosophy.
Test workflow tool with structured outputs and integration points in the test pipeline.
Downstream consumer of test-context packages; useful to keep output schema/artifacts compatible.

selected.why: Use the dedicated command doc as the primary oracle, then gap-check against tooling (ccw/src/tools registry + session_manager routing).
